decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1/4, 2/4, 4/4, Location Plan, Design & Access Statement received 11/09/2013 and 3/4-0 Received 06/11/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for hot-food takeaway (A5) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times Monday-Sundays, including Public and Bank Holidays 11.00-23.00. All customers shall have left the premises no later than 30 minutes after the closing times listed above.
Condition : 4 - The scheme of extract ventilation shown on the approved drawings shall be carried out before any part of the development hereby permitted is occupied.

Condition : 5 - The rating level of noise emitted from fixed plant on the site, shall be lower than the existing background noise level by 10dB. The noise levels shall be determined at the nearest noise sensitive locations. The levels shall be determined according to BS4142:1997.
Condition : 6 - The extractor flue should not be used between the hours of 23.30 and 07.00 any day of the week.
description: Change of use from A1 (retail) to A5 (hot food take away) including the installation of an external duct
